original: intros u l H. unfold is_inf_seq. destruct l. - intros eps. destruct (H eps) as [Hl' Hr']. split. + intros n. specialize (Hl' n). unfold Rbar_is_glb in H. destruct H as [Hl _]. destruct Hl' as [m Hm]. exists m. rewrite Hm. auto. + destruct (Hr' eps) as [n Hn]. exists n. unfold Rbar_le in Hn. auto. - intros M n. specialize (H M). unfold Rbar_is_glb in H. destruct H as [Hl Hr]. apply Hr. intros x Hx. destruct Hx as [m Hm]. rewrite Hm. auto.
